Song of the Day 05/12/2018

Title: 18

Artist: One Direction

Album: FOUR

Genre: Pop Rock

Year: 2014

summary: House of solo just followed harry styles after following louis. Please explain that to me? Why would they follow harry in...
body:
House of solo just followed harry styles after following louis. Please explain that to me? Why would they follow harry in particular. Not liam or niall. HUH? What logical explanation is there for that besides 1) Harry and Louis are finally coming out through House of solo (I fucking wish) or 2) Harry was there at Louis’ shoot to support and was interacting with everyone there.

And all the other fucking coincidences that have been occurring over the last few days. The Bring me the Horizon concert that Jordan (louis’ photographer was at) and the fact that the singer from the band was last featured in House of Solo and Harry posed for pics with him.

I just…these little coincidences fuck me up

summary: When You Are Away From Me It's Harder to Breathe
title: When You Are Away From Me It's Harder to Breathe
body:
One-shot

Part two

Since Harry showed up at my doorstep unexpectedly almost a year ago, I’ve only seen him one other time. Between his tour schedule and appearances and recording, he had no time to come see me.And…

Read more…

title: Diffrent Times, New Things
body:
When Sammy has to go back to London for her Grandmothers funeral what happens when she meets Harry Styles but is only there for the summer?

summary: In The Heat of Los Angeles
title: In The Heat of Los Angeles
body:
This city’s killing me. I want, I want, I want everything. This city’s killing me, In the heat of Los Angeles.

Epilogue: Landslide (Fleetwood Mac)

“I feel like we just did this,” Harry said as he pulled me into him in the back of the car.“We pretty much did. Three weeks ago.” I rested my head on his shoulder and watched the street fly by…

Read more…

title: Lighthouse
body:
He smiled, amused. “You don’t want to be forgotten.” I nodded my head in agreement, “I don’t think anyone does Styles.” I stated softly. “Not true. I wouldn’t mind.” I looked up feeling slightly surprised. Little did I know that he wasn’t one to be easily forgotten.

remember me?

“Sit. You look dead.” I huffed as I threw my boots off and eagerly settled down on Harry’s old leather couch, facing the opposite end and tucking my legs in. “It’s cold.” I shivered,…

Read more…

summary: Harry Styles is the type of artist to get all the words you’ve been meaning to say for anreally long time but don’t know how to...
body:
Harry Styles is the type of artist to get all the words you’ve been meaning to say for anreally long time but don’t know how to say it, into a song.


I feel everything he singing about in my chest.


I don’t know, maybe it’s just me.

Kelsey :) 23 Harry Styles has my heart.."We never learn, we've been here before." My Masterpieces!
Ask Me Anything!!

title: The Secret’s Gate
body:
You and Harry have been together for quite a while now. Things have been going great between the two of you. He was like a dream come true, a real prince charming. You couldn’t see your life without him, and couldn’t wait for the day that you became Mrs. Harry Styles.

Harry was currently on tour, and you missed him terribly. To filled the void, you spent most days with your friends. You even spent a lot of time with Harry’s family. Ann adored you, and you and Gemma had become like sisters. It really helped to have them close by, on the days that became unbearably lonely.

You were on the way to  have lunch with them both. Harry was set to come on in a few days, and you had some wonderful news to share. You wanted their input on how to surprise Harry with the news.

Entering the restaurant, you found them right away. You told the Host who you were, and he escorted you to the table.

“Y/n!, It’s so good to see you!” Gemma gushed giving you a hug.

“You look lovely my dear,” Anna said, as you hugged her.

“I’ve missed you both! I’m so glad you were able to come today. How have you been?”

They both dived deep into conversation. You all carried on, talking about the things you had been up to and what was new in life. You found it quite easy to talk to them about most anything.

As you were all finishing up on your meal, you sat back and looked at them. “Sooo I’m guessing you’re both wondering why I asked you to lunch today.” They nodded their heads and urged you to continue. “Well I need your help in something. You see I have this big surprise for Harry, but I’m not sure how to go about it.”

“What’s the surprise?” Gemma eagerly asked.

“Well it’s sort of a surprise for the two of you as well.” You reached into your bag and retrieved two cards. Handing them both a card, you looked at them with a huge smile on your face. As they opened the card, you waited for their reaction.

“NO!” Gemma screamed first. “Are you really?” She asked excited.

You simply nodded your head, and she screamed and reached across the table to hug you.

“I’m gonna be a grandma!” Anne cried.

“You are,” you informed her smiling.

She had tears rolling down her face, as she too reached over to hug you once more.

“There is one more thing though.”

“What is it?” Gemma asked.

“We’re having twins.” You said excited.

They both gasped and cheered with you.

“Well the more the merrier,” Anne declared.

“Now, you just have to help me surprise Harry. I want to do something big!”

They both eagerly starting spilling out ideas.

“Ohh we could go to his concert and have them project it on the monitors!” Gemma offered.

“I’m not sure he would want the public to know about it just yet,” you told her.

“Right, ummm we could throw a party for when he gets back, and invite all of his and yours closest friends and family. Then make an announcement at the party.”

“I kinda like that idea, let’s do that!”

You both sprang into conversation. You wanted to air out all the details. You had to plan the guest list and what food would be served. This party would definitely be one to remember.

You were still airing out details, when your phone started to go off.”

Looking at it you smiled, “Speak of the devil, it’s Harry you told the two.”

You answered it cheerfully, “Hey Honey! I’m just sitting here with your mom and sister, what are you up to?”

“Y/N?” A strange voice asked.

You froze, “Yes?”

“Hey, It’s Jeff.”

“Jeff? What’s going on? Why are you calling me from Harry’s phone?”

“I don’t know how to tell you this, but there’s been an accident. Harry’s in the hospital.”

Your heart stopped, as time seem to stand still. Tears were streaming down your face, and your phone slipped out of your hand. Seeing your reaction and knowing that it was about her brother, Gemma quickly grabbed the phone. You couldn’t hear what she was saying. All that ran through your head was the words that Jeff had spoken. ‘There’s been an accident, Harry’s in the hospital.’

The world seemed to stop around you. You could somewhat sense Gemma’s arms around you, helping you walk to the car. You were all panicking. Gemma seemed to be the one to take charge. She told the driver to take you all to the airport, Jeff had a private plane ready and waiting.

You couldn’t seem to form any words to speak. Gemma sat in the middle of you and Anne, with an arm around both of you. There was not a dry eye in the car. You couldn’t bare to look at Anne, knowing that if you did you would break down ten times as worse.

The drive to the airport seemed to take forever, as the driver dove in and out of traffic. He could sense the urgency of the situation so he tried to go as fast as he possibly could.

Within twenty minutes the three of you were strapped into the cabin of the private plan and preparing for take off.

“He’s has to be okay,” you finally mumbled. “Our kids need their father.”

Gemma wrapped you in her arms. “He’ll be okay. He would never leave you.”

Her words were little comfort, as the plane started to take off. It took about an hour for the plane to touch back down. It had been the longest hour of your life. Your mind had gone through all the worst case possibilities that you could think off.  

There was a car waiting for the three of you, as you stepped out of the plane. No words were said. Everyone was silently praying for the best and just eager to get to the hospital.

It took another fifteen minutes in the car, before you finally arrived. You grew more and more impatient as the clock dragged on.

Finally reaching your destination, all of you jumped out of the car simultaneously. There were cops everywhere, holding back fans. You didn’t have time to think about that though. Rushing through the doors, you were escorted to the 3rd floor. Stepping out of the elevator, a doctor approached your group.

“Ahh, you must be here for Mr. Styles.”

“Yes, I’m his mother, this is his sister and his girlfriend. How is he? Can we see him?”

“Hello, Im Dr. Jackson. Harry was in a very serious car accident. He was banged up pretty badly. There doesn’t seem to be any internal damage, but he did break his left arm which will eventually need surgery. But other than that he should be okay. He’s going to be extremely sore for the next week or so, so make sure he gets plenty of rest. He’s resting now, but your more than welcome to go in and see him. He’s in suite 320.”

“Thank you doctor!” You all said at once.

Walking down the hallway, hand in hand, you looked for Harry’s room. Once there, you took a deep breath. Anne was the first one to walk through the door, followed by Gemma. It took you a moment to gather up enough strength to walk through the door.

Once you could, you slowly made your way into the room. Harry was laid out on the bed asleep. He had cuts and bruises everywhere and his left arm was in a cast. Seeing the cast an idea came to you.

“Does anyone have a Sharpie I could use?” You asked around.

Jeff, who was seated next to Harry stood up, “I’ll go find you one!”

“What are you gonna do?” asked Gemma.

“Screw a surprise party, I’m gonna tell him now.” You told her smiling. Her answering smile was encouraging.

Anne had moved to sit in the chair beside Harry. “I think that’s a marvelous idea dear.” She said softly.

Jeff came back in the room holding his treasure in his hands. “I found one!” He exclaimed.

“Thank you!” you told him as you took the silver sharpie from him.

Kneeling over, you started to wrote on Harry’s cast. You were careful not to wake him.

My Sweet Harry,

I love you with all

of my heart, and can not

bear the thought of losing you.

Our two little angels need their

Father! We love you!!


Satisfied with your work, you stepped back. It was getting late in the day, so the room started to slowly get darker.

“Y/n, dear you need to rest. You look exhausted.” Anne spoke up.

“I can’t leave him,” you stated simply. Taking in her words, you carefully laid down in the bed beside Harry. Putting your hand over his heart to make sure he was still there, you drifted off peacefully.

A few hours had past before he began to stir. You axiomatically responded and were wide awake.

“Hey there sleepy head.” You said smiling at him lovingly.

“Y/n?, When did you get here? I’ve missed you so much!”

“We’ll someone had to go and give your entire family a heart attack,” you teased. “We we’re all together when we heard the news and we flew out as quick as we could.”

“We?” He asked, looking around he saw his mom asleep in the chair next to his bed and his beloved sister asleep on a couch in the corner of the room. “Why were you all together?” He asked confused.

“Well I needed their help with something so we went to lunch.”

“Help with what?” He asked curiously.

“That’s not important anymore. Why don’t you read what I wrote on your cast?” You suggested.

Intrigued, he lifted his arm to take a look. It took him a few moments to comprehend what the message said.

“I’m gonna be a dad?” He asked cheerfully.

“Yes, my love you’re gonna be a dad to two little angels.”

Tears started to stream down his eyes, as he pulled you in close. “I love you so much! I won’t ever leave you or our children.”

“Jeff? What’s going on? Why are you calling me from Harry’s phone?”

“I don’t know how to tell you this, but there’s been an accident. Harry’s in the hospital.”

Your heart stopped, as time seem to stand still. Tears were streaming down your face, and your phone slipped out of your hand. Seeing your reaction and knowing that it was about her brother, Gemma quickly grabbed the phone. You couldn’t hear what she was saying. All that ran through your head was the words that Jeff had spoken. ‘There’s been an accident, Harry’s in the hospital.’

The world seemed to stop around you. You could somewhat sense Gemma’s arms around you, helping you walk to the car. You were all panicking. Gemma seemed to be the one to take charge. She told the driver to take you all to the airport, Jeff had a private plane ready and waiting.

You couldn’t seem to form any words to speak. Gemma sat in the middle of you and Anne, with an arm around both of you. There was not a dry eye in the car. You couldn’t bare to look at Anne, knowing that if you did you would break down ten times as worse.

The drive to the airport seemed to take forever, as the driver dove in and out of traffic. He could sense the urgency of the situation so he tried to go as fast as he possibly could.

Within twenty minutes the three of you were strapped into the cabin of the private plan and preparing for take off.

“He’s has to be okay,” you finally mumbled. “Our kids need their father.”

Gemma wrapped you in her arms. “He’ll be okay. He would never leave you.”

Her words were little comfort, as the plane started to take off. It took about an hour for the plane to touch back down. It had been the longest hour of your life. Your mind had gone through all the worst case possibilities that you could think off.  

There was a car waiting for the three of you, as you stepped out of the plane. No words were said. Everyone was silently praying for the best and just eager to get to the hospital.

It took another fifteen minutes in the car, before you finally arrived. You grew more and more impatient as the clock dragged on.

Finally reaching your destination, all of you jumped out of the car simultaneously. There were cops everywhere, holding back fans. You didn’t have time to think about that though. Rushing through the doors, you were escorted to the 3rd floor. Stepping out of the elevator, a doctor approached your group.

“Ahh, you must be here for Mr. Styles.”

“Yes, I’m his mother, this is his sister and his girlfriend. How is he? Can we see him?”

“Hello, Im Dr. Jackson. Harry was in a very serious car accident. He was banged up pretty badly. There doesn’t seem to be any internal damage, but he did break his left arm which will eventually need surgery. But other than that he should be okay. He’s going to be extremely sore for the next week or so, so make sure he gets plenty of rest. He’s resting now, but your more than welcome to go in and see him. He’s in suite 320.”

“Thank you doctor!” You all said at once.

Walking down the hallway, hand in hand, you looked for Harry’s room. Once there, you took a deep breath. Anne was the first one to walk through the door, followed by Gemma. It took you a moment to gather up enough strength to walk through the door.

Once you could, you slowly made your way into the room. Harry was laid out on the bed asleep. He had cuts and bruises everywhere and his left arm was in a cast. Seeing the cast an idea came to you.

“Does anyone have a Sharpie I could use?” You asked around.

Jeff, who was seated next to Harry stood up, “I’ll go find you one!”

“What are you gonna do?” asked Gemma.

“Screw a surprise party, I’m gonna tell him now.” You told her smiling. Her answering smile was encouraging.

Anne had moved to sit in the chair beside Harry. “I think that’s a marvelous idea dear.” She said softly.

Jeff came back in the room holding his treasure in his hands. “I found one!” He exclaimed.

“Thank you!” you told him as you took the silver sharpie from him.

Kneeling over, you started to wrote on Harry’s cast. You were careful not to wake him.

My Sweet Harry,

I love you with all

of my heart, and can not

bear the thought of losing you.

Our two little angels need their

Father! We love you!!


Satisfied with your work, you stepped back. It was getting late in the day, so the room started to slowly get darker.

“Y/n, dear you need to rest. You look exhausted.” Anne spoke up.

“I can’t leave him,” you stated simply. Taking in her words, you carefully laid down in the bed beside Harry. Putting your hand over his heart to make sure he was still there, you drifted off peacefully.

A few hours had past before he began to stir. You axiomatically responded and were wide awake.

“Hey there sleepy head.” You said smiling at him lovingly.

“Y/n?, When did you get here? I’ve missed you so much!”

“We’ll someone had to go and give your entire family a heart attack,” you teased. “We we’re all together when we heard the news and we flew out as quick as we could.”

“We?” He asked, looking around he saw his mom asleep in the chair next to his bed and his beloved sister asleep on a couch in the corner of the room. “Why were you all together?” He asked confused.

“Well I needed their help with something so we went to lunch.”

“Help with what?” He asked curiously.

“That’s not important anymore. Why don’t you read what I wrote on your cast?” You suggested.

Intrigued, he lifted his arm to take a look. It took him a few moments to comprehend what the message said.

“I’m gonna be a dad?” He asked cheerfully.

“Yes, my love you’re gonna be a dad to two little angels.”

Tears started to stream down his eyes, as he pulled you in close. “I love you so much! I won’t ever leave you or our children.”

trail.content_raw:
You and Harry have been together for quite a while now. Things have been going great between the two of you. He was like a dream come true, a real prince charming. You couldn’t see your life without him, and couldn’t wait for the day that you became Mrs. Harry Styles.

Harry was currently on tour, and you missed him terribly. To filled the void, you spent most days with your friends. You even spent a lot of time with Harry’s family. Ann adored you, and you and Gemma had become like sisters. It really helped to have them close by, on the days that became unbearably lonely.

You were on the way to  have lunch with them both. Harry was set to come on in a few days, and you had some wonderful news to share. You wanted their input on how to surprise Harry with the news.

Entering the restaurant, you found them right away. You told the Host who you were, and he escorted you to the table.

“Y/n!, It’s so good to see you!” Gemma gushed giving you a hug.

“You look lovely my dear,” Anna said, as you hugged her.

“I’ve missed you both! I’m so glad you were able to come today. How have you been?”

They both dived deep into conversation. You all carried on, talking about the things you had been up to and what was new in life. You found it quite easy to talk to them about most anything.

As you were all finishing up on your meal, you sat back and looked at them. “Sooo I’m guessing you’re both wondering why I asked you to lunch today.” They nodded their heads and urged you to continue. “Well I need your help in something. You see I have this big surprise for Harry, but I’m not sure how to go about it.”

“What’s the surprise?” Gemma eagerly asked.

“Well it’s sort of a surprise for the two of you as well.” You reached into your bag and retrieved two cards. Handing them both a card, you looked at them with a huge smile on your face. As they opened the card, you waited for their reaction.

“NO!” Gemma screamed first. “Are you really?” She asked excited.

You simply nodded your head, and she screamed and reached across the table to hug you.

“I’m gonna be a grandma!” Anne cried.

“You are,” you informed her smiling.

She had tears rolling down her face, as she too reached over to hug you once more.

“There is one more thing though.”

“What is it?” Gemma asked.

“We’re having twins.” You said excited.

They both gasped and cheered with you.

“Well the more the merrier,” Anne declared.

“Now, you just have to help me surprise Harry. I want to do something big!”

They both eagerly starting spilling out ideas.

“Ohh we could go to his concert and have them project it on the monitors!” Gemma offered.

“I’m not sure he would want the public to know about it just yet,” you told her.

“Right, ummm we could throw a party for when he gets back, and invite all of his and yours closest friends and family. Then make an announcement at the party.”

“I kinda like that idea, let’s do that!”

You both sprang into conversation. You wanted to air out all the details. You had to plan the guest list and what food would be served. This party would definitely be one to remember.

You were still airing out details, when your phone started to go off.”

Looking at it you smiled, “Speak of the devil, it’s Harry you told the two.”

You answered it cheerfully, “Hey Honey! I’m just sitting here with your mom and sister, what are you up to?”

“Y/N?” A strange voice asked.

You froze, “Yes?”

“Hey, It’s Jeff.”

“Jeff? What’s going on? Why are you calling me from Harry’s phone?”

“I don’t know how to tell you this, but there’s been an accident. Harry’s in the hospital.”

Your heart stopped, as time seem to stand still. Tears were streaming down your face, and your phone slipped out of your hand. Seeing your reaction and knowing that it was about her brother, Gemma quickly grabbed the phone. You couldn’t hear what she was saying. All that ran through your head was the words that Jeff had spoken. ‘There’s been an accident, Harry’s in the hospital.’

The world seemed to stop around you. You could somewhat sense Gemma’s arms around you, helping you walk to the car. You were all panicking. Gemma seemed to be the one to take charge. She told the driver to take you all to the airport, Jeff had a private plane ready and waiting.

You couldn’t seem to form any words to speak. Gemma sat in the middle of you and Anne, with an arm around both of you. There was not a dry eye in the car. You couldn’t bare to look at Anne, knowing that if you did you would break down ten times as worse.

The drive to the airport seemed to take forever, as the driver dove in and out of traffic. He could sense the urgency of the situation so he tried to go as fast as he possibly could.

Within twenty minutes the three of you were strapped into the cabin of the private plan and preparing for take off.

“He’s has to be okay,” you finally mumbled. “Our kids need their father.”

Gemma wrapped you in her arms. “He’ll be okay. He would never leave you.”

Her words were little comfort, as the plane started to take off. It took about an hour for the plane to touch back down. It had been the longest hour of your life. Your mind had gone through all the worst case possibilities that you could think off.  

There was a car waiting for the three of you, as you stepped out of the plane. No words were said. Everyone was silently praying for the best and just eager to get to the hospital.

It took another fifteen minutes in the car, before you finally arrived. You grew more and more impatient as the clock dragged on.

Finally reaching your destination, all of you jumped out of the car simultaneously. There were cops everywhere, holding back fans. You didn’t have time to think about that though. Rushing through the doors, you were escorted to the 3rd floor. Stepping out of the elevator, a doctor approached your group.

“Ahh, you must be here for Mr. Styles.”

“Yes, I’m his mother, this is his sister and his girlfriend. How is he? Can we see him?”

“Hello, Im Dr. Jackson. Harry was in a very serious car accident. He was banged up pretty badly. There doesn’t seem to be any internal damage, but he did break his left arm which will eventually need surgery. But other than that he should be okay. He’s going to be extremely sore for the next week or so, so make sure he gets plenty of rest. He’s resting now, but your more than welcome to go in and see him. He’s in suite 320.”

“Thank you doctor!” You all said at once.

Walking down the hallway, hand in hand, you looked for Harry’s room. Once there, you took a deep breath. Anne was the first one to walk through the door, followed by Gemma. It took you a moment to gather up enough strength to walk through the door.

Once you could, you slowly made your way into the room. Harry was laid out on the bed asleep. He had cuts and bruises everywhere and his left arm was in a cast. Seeing the cast an idea came to you.

“Does anyone have a Sharpie I could use?” You asked around.

Jeff, who was seated next to Harry stood up, “I’ll go find you one!”

“What are you gonna do?” asked Gemma.

“Screw a surprise party, I’m gonna tell him now.” You told her smiling. Her answering smile was encouraging.

Anne had moved to sit in the chair beside Harry. “I think that’s a marvelous idea dear.” She said softly.

Jeff came back in the room holding his treasure in his hands. “I found one!” He exclaimed.

“Thank you!” you told him as you took the silver sharpie from him.

Kneeling over, you started to wrote on Harry’s cast. You were careful not to wake him.

My Sweet Harry,

I love you with all

of my heart, and can not

bear the thought of losing you.

Our two little angels need their

Father! We love you!!


Satisfied with your work, you stepped back. It was getting late in the day, so the room started to slowly get darker.

“Y/n, dear you need to rest. You look exhausted.” Anne spoke up.

“I can’t leave him,” you stated simply. Taking in her words, you carefully laid down in the bed beside Harry. Putting your hand over his heart to make sure he was still there, you drifted off peacefully.

A few hours had past before he began to stir. You axiomatically responded and were wide awake.

“Hey there sleepy head.” You said smiling at him lovingly.

“Y/n?, When did you get here? I’ve missed you so much!”

“We’ll someone had to go and give your entire family a heart attack,” you teased. “We we’re all together when we heard the news and we flew out as quick as we could.”

“We?” He asked, looking around he saw his mom asleep in the chair next to his bed and his beloved sister asleep on a couch in the corner of the room. “Why were you all together?” He asked confused.

“Well I needed their help with something so we went to lunch.”

“Help with what?” He asked curiously.

“That’s not important anymore. Why don’t you read what I wrote on your cast?” You suggested.

Intrigued, he lifted his arm to take a look. It took him a few moments to comprehend what the message said.

“I’m gonna be a dad?” He asked cheerfully.

“Yes, my love you’re gonna be a dad to two little angels.”

Tears started to stream down his eyes, as he pulled you in close. “I love you so much! I won’t ever leave you or our children.”

summary: One Direction - If I Could Fly
